title: Architecting for Features
description: A few months ago, I gave a talk titled Build Features, Not Apps at iOS Conf SG – you can view the full talk here. It was clearer than ever to me after WWDC 2016 that the future of apps is a web of distributed features instead of one concentrated app. Think of Apple Watch, Today’s Widget, Rich Notifications, App Search, iMessage Stickers, and the list goes on…
